widgets.title: Service limit status for resources (summary view)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT uniqueCount(`aws.trustedadvisor.limitName`) FROM Metric WHERE metricName = 'aws.trustedadvisor.status' FACET cases(WHERE aws.trustedadvisor.status like 'Red' as '100% of limit', WHERE aws.trustedadvisor.status like 'Yellow' as '80%-99% of limit', WHERE aws.trustedadvisor.status like 'Green' as 'Below 80% of limit', WHERE aws.trustedadvisor.status like 'Blue' as 'No data received') SINCE 1 day ago

widgets.title: Service limit status for resources (chart view)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT uniqueCount(`aws.trustedadvisor.limitName`) FROM Metric WHERE metricName = 'aws.trustedadvisor.status' FACET cases(WHERE aws.trustedadvisor.status like 'Red' as '100% of limit', WHERE aws.trustedadvisor.status like 'Yellow' as '80%-99% of limit', WHERE aws.trustedadvisor.status like 'Green' as 'Below 80% of limit', WHERE aws.trustedadvisor.status like 'Blue' as 'No data received') TIMESERIES SINCE 1 week ago

widgets.title: Resources per service at 100% of limit

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT uniqueCount(`aws.trustedadvisor.resourceId`) FROM Metric WHERE metricName = 'aws.trustedadvisor.status' aws.trustedadvisor.status='Red' FACET aws.trustedadvisor.service SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 1000

widgets.title: Resources per service at 80%-99% of limit

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT uniqueCount(`aws.trustedadvisor.resourceId`) FROM Metric WHERE metricName = 'aws.trustedadvisor.status' aws.trustedadvisor.status='Yellow' FACET aws.trustedadvisor.service SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 1000

widgets.title: Resources per service under 80% of limit

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT uniqueCount(`aws.trustedadvisor.resourceId`) FROM Metric WHERE metricName = 'aws.trustedadvisor.status' aws.trustedadvisor.status='Green' FACET aws.trustedadvisor.service SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 1000

widgets.title: Service limit usage for resources at 100% of limit

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT latest(`aws.trustedadvisor.limitUsage`) FROM Metric WHERE aws.trustedadvisor.limitUsage >= 1 FACET aws.trustedadvisor.limitName, aws.trustedadvisor.service, aws.region SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 1000

widgets.title: Service limit usage for resources at 80%-99% of limit

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT latest(`aws.trustedadvisor.limitUsage`) FROM Metric WHERE aws.trustedadvisor.limitUsage >= 0.8 aws.trustedadvisor.limitUsage < 1 FACET aws.trustedadvisor.limitName, aws.trustedadvisor.service, aws.region SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 1000

widgets.title: Service limit usage for resources under 80% of limit

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT latest(`aws.trustedadvisor.limitUsage`) FROM Metric WHERE aws.trustedadvisor.limitUsage < 0.8 FACET aws.trustedadvisor.limitName, aws.trustedadvisor.service, aws.region SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 1000

SELECT latest(`aws.trustedadvisor.limitUsage`) as 'Service Limit Usage', latest(aws.trustedadvisor.currentUsage) as 'Current Usage', latest(aws.trustedadvisor.limitAmount) as 'Limit Amount' FROM Metric FACET aws.trustedadvisor.service, aws.trustedadvisor.limitName, aws.region SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 1000

rawConfiguration.text:
::: beyond
![AWS Trusted Advisor Icon](https://integrations.nr-assets.net/providers/aws_trustedadvisor.png) **AWS Trusted Advisor Service Limits** 

AWS Trusted Advisor offers a set of best practice checks across different categories. One of these categories is service limits. Service Limits Check inspects your position with regard to the most important service limits for each AWS product.


:::
